Method Detail

getInstance

public static ChannelsManager getInstance(GameLogicState state,
                                          java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends GameLogicActionInterface>> loai)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Instantiate the ChannelsManager, required for the consumption and the publication of messages. As soon as this method is called, the consumption of messages is automatically started.

Parameters:
state - the GameLogicState of the player
loai - the list of GameLogicAction
Returns:
the ChannelsManager to use to publish messages.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an exception occurs during the connection to the RabbitMQ broker.

getInstance

public static ChannelsManager getInstance(GameLogicState state,
                                          java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends GameLogicActionInterface>> loai,
                                          boolean enableRawAction)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Instantiate the ChannelsManager, required for the consumption and the publication of messages. As soon as this method is called, the consumption of messages is automatically started. If the action kind and the action name of the messages consumed are not registered in the list of GameLogicAction, setting the boolean enableRawAction to true allow to trigger a generic raw action, instead of raising an ActionInvocationException.

Parameters:
state - the GameLogicState of the player
loai - the list of GameLogicAction
enableRawAction - to enable the use of a generic raw action.
Returns:
the ChannelsManager to use to publish messages.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an exception occurs during the connection to the RabbitMQ broker.

publish

public void publish(java.lang.String consumer,
                    GameLogicState state,
                    GameLogicActionInterface action,
                    java.lang.String message)
             throws java.io.IOException
Publish a message to a specific recipient (designed by its login) and specify the action that should be triggered by the recipient on the reception of this message.

Parameters:
consumer - the login of the recipient
state - the GameLogicState of the game logic
action - the action to trigger on the recipient side
message - the message
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an exception occurs during the publish.
com.rabbitmq.client.MissedHeartbeatException - when the maximum numbers of retry has been done. The method PlayerState.exit() should be called on the handling of this exception.

action - the name of the action to trigger on the recipient side

                         GameLogicActionInterface action,
                         java.lang.String message)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Publish a message to all the players and to the Game Logic server, and specify the action that should be triggered by recipients on the reception of this message.

Parameters:
state - the GameLogicState of the game logic
action - the action to trigger on the recipient side
message - the message
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an exception occurs during the publish.
com.rabbitmq.client.MissedHeartbeatException - when the maximum numbers of retry has been done. The method PlayerState.exit() should be called on the handling of this exception.
